meaningMnemonic: Use <radical>simultaneous</radical> <radical>jackhammer</radical>s to perform the <kanji>purification</kanji> ritual. Two jackhammers running perfectly in sync will purify your body, mind, and soul! (And the ground around you that's being jackhammered.)
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>purification</kanji> ritual is supposed to help you forget your <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい). It's been a while, but you can't seem to get it out of your head.
